note.p: Burial: Chapel of the Charterhouse, London
Education: Charterhouse, Surrey; Trinity College Cambridge. BA (1782, 16th Wrangler) MA (1785) BD (1794) DD (1799)
Career: Headmaster of Charterhouse School (07 June 1791 until his death); preacher at Gray's Inn (1809); Rector, Hallingbury, Essex (1810)
Notes: Intimate friend of Richard Porson, the Greek scholar
